backend/main.mo: Defines a backend actor with storage mixins, access control, user approval, and numerous app data types including profiles, game progress, chat, events, rewards, and parental controls.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing required fixes for Art Gallery upload authentication and error‑reporting improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files, summarizing functionality for pages, components, and hooks across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application router that imports all pages and games, sets providers, and renders the full app layout.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCeleb: Implements a global celebration UI with confetti or fireworks effects, using a queue system and React portals.
UI wrapper that checks user approval status and shows a request-approval flow before granting access to protected content.
Displays temporary animated encouragement messages using a global queue and portal, with a helper to trigger feedback events.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides a reusable game screen layout with header, scores, sound toggle, pet upgrades, and achievement triggers.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main app header with authentication controls, navigation buttons, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/HomepageFeatures: Displays a grid of feature cards highlighting various app modules with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/InstantMiniActiv: Implements three mini-games for different age groups with canvas-based interactions, timers, and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/ArtsMu: Activity component that runs various arts and music mini‑games (color mixing, drawing, rhythm, instruments, creative prompts) based on lesson ID with progress and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Discov: Activity component for discovery-themed games such as facts, how‑it‑works, world explorer, and inventions, with step progression and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Readin: Reading and vocabulary activity handling phonics, word-building, stories, spelling, and vocabulary games with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Scienc: Science and nature activity supporting weather, space, animals, and plants games, each with quizzes or matching tasks.
frontend/src/components/MascotGuide.tsx: Shows a contextual mascot helper that displays messages per page, with optional voice playback and a collapsible UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component allowing kids to enter name and age and submit a profile via mutateAsync, with validation and styled UI.
frontend/src/content/seasonalEventStorie: Exports a dataset of kid‑safe seasonal stories with IDs, text, and narration scripts for read‑along experiences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity restoration using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query and mutation helpers plus many frontend types for interacting with backend data such as users, badges, artwork, chat, and events.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, fonts, and theme variables for light and dark modes including colors and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements an admin dashboard UI for viewing stats, managing users, and applying or removing restrictions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtGalleryPage.tsx: Provides an artwork gallery UI allowing users to upload images, preview them, and submit to private or public galleries.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarCreatorPage.tsx: Provides an avatar builder with selectable parts, randomization, preview, and save support via API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Generates achievement certificates using canvas, allows custom text, previews, downloads, and lists user certificates.
frontend/src/pages/ChatModule.tsx: Implements a local chat UI with contacts, message history, emoji support, and basic message sending.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Real-time chat using backend queries for online users and messages, with identity-based messaging and auto-refresh.
frontend/src/pages/CraftDIYPage.tsx: Displays craft projects by category, shows steps and materials, and marks projects completed with badge rewards.
frontend/src/pages/CreativeFunHub.tsx: Hub page listing creative modules with descriptions, icons, and navigation to each activity.
frontend/src/pages/DanceChallengePage.ts: Dance challenge UI that lets users pick routines, cycle through poses, and optionally use the camera via a custom hook.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard listing navigable app modules with search, authentication checks, and admin-only visibility.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardCreator.tsx: Interactive event card designer with templates, fonts, stickers, and download/share actions.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardsPage.tsx: Card creation interface allowing templates, colors, and preview, plus a simple gallery tab.
frontend/src/pages/EventsModule.tsx: Event manager for creating, listing, and styling events with types, dates, icons, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders an events page with local event state, add-form UI, and a dismissible event notification component using timers and badges.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Provides a feedback submission form with type selection, textarea input, and integration with feedback query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackSystem.tsx: Implements an alternate feedback form with satisfaction icons, type selection, and basic validation before showing success toasts.
frontend/src/pages/FunnyFartHub.tsx: Displays a large list of themed fart sound buttons with metadata and navigation support for a humorous soundboard module.
frontend/src/pages/games/AmbulanceRescue: A timed rescue game where the player moves an ambulance to save patients, tracking score, high score, and spawning patients dynamically. Handles keyboard movement, collisions, and game state.
frontend/src/pages/games/BalloonPop.tsx: Balloon popping game using requestAnimationFrame to animate balloons, track score, spawn types, and render pop effects. Includes timing, high score logic, and touch/click interactions.
frontend/src/pages/games/BibbleAdventure: Platformer game with jumping physics, coin collection, and falling hazards. Manages player movement, gravity, platform collisions, and score progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeDec: Interactive cake-decorating game where users place emoji decorations on a cake to earn points and finish for a final score.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeMak: Step-based cake-making game where players choose base, flavor, and layers to build a cake and accumulate points.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossesLearnHabi: Boss fight game where the boss learns player movement patterns to predict attacks while the player dodges and shoots.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossFightOnly.t: Canvas boss-fight game with player movement, projectiles, multi-phase bosses, and score progression across bosses.
frontend/src/pages/games/CatGrapplingHoo: Physics-based grappling hook game where a cat swings, collects food, avoids enemies, and accumulates score.
frontend/src/pages/games/CityMovingPlatf: Canvas platformer where the player jumps across rotating moving platforms; manages physics, collisions, scoring, and game over state.
Game where the player moves automatically toward a goal while the user controls enemies to obstruct them; includes level progression and enemy selection.
frontend/src/pages/games/CronkerKontry.t: Incremental resource‑management game with buildings, upgrades, prestige, and achievements generating gold, food, and power over time.
frontend/src/pages/games/DelayedControls: Movement game where inputs are delayed via a queued system; includes obstacles, coins, and collision handling with scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/DungeonJanitorS: Top‑down cleaning game where the player moves around removing debris types for points while new debris spawns over time.
Top-down space survival game managing player movement, enemies, projectiles, energy orbs, and adaptive difficulty with AI hints.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemiesPlatform: Platformer where flying enemies act as moving platforms the player jumps across to reach a goal while avoiding attacks.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemyControlsCa: Arena game where an enemy controls the camera while the player collects coins and avoids being caught.
frontend/src/pages/games/EscapeRoomUnive: Multi-room escape game where players find hidden items, unlock new themed rooms, and race against a countdown timer.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingBreak: Platformer where platforms break after use, forcing the player to move quickly toward the goal while managing jumps and timing.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingIsBut: Canvas-based game where clicking randomized buttons triggers actions affecting the player and score, with movement handled by keyboard input.
frontend/src/pages/games/FamousPlaces.ts: Multiple‑choice quiz asking locations of famous landmarks, tracking score, question progression, and high score.
frontend/src/pages/games/FinalBoss.tsx: Defense game where the player places traps to stop advancing heroes from damaging a boss, with waves, scoring, and trap selection.
frontend/src/pages/games/FloorIsLiar.tsx: Platformer where platforms may lie about being safe, requiring careful navigation to reach a goal while managing movement and collisions.
frontend/src/pages/games/ForestNight.tsx: Top‑down movement game in a dark forest where the player collects coins to increase score and visibility while racing against a timer.
frontend/src/pages/games/GadgetCombat.ts: Top‑down gadget combat game where enemies spawn, move toward the player, and can be stunned or captured using different gadgets with cooldowns.
frontend/src/pages/games/GlitchWorldEsca: Platformer with glitch mode that toggles which platforms are solid while the player jumps, moves, and avoids falling to keep progressing.
frontend/src/pages/games/GrandmaSecretAr: Canvas arcade hub featuring three minigames—whack‑a‑mole, catch, and memory—with dynamic grandma messages and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/InventoryIsEnem: Top‑down survival game where inventory weight slows the player and causes damage while collecting items, avoiding enemies, and reaching a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/LiesAndTruths.t: Platformer centered on truth‑or‑lie hints about platform safety as the player navigates platforms toward a goal with jumping and gravity.
frontend/src/pages/games/MemoryMatch.tsx: A React memory match game that manages cards, levels, scoring, and matching logic with dynamic grid sizes.
A puzzle maze game where each room has a color, pattern, or sequence puzzle that increases score when solved.
frontend/src/pages/games/MonsterMaze.tsx: A canvas-based maze navigation game with moving monsters, collision detection, scoring, and an exit goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/MoveWhenBlink.t: A blink‑activated movement game where the player moves only during a timed blink window while avoiding enemies.
frontend/src/pages/games/NumberRunner.ts: A lane‑runner math game generating obstacles with math problems the player must answer while avoiding collisions.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneButtonHero.t: Canvas runner where a single button controls jump, dash, or shield based on press duration, with obstacle spawning and collision logic. Manages physics, cooldowns, scoring, and input timing.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneRoomInfinite: Mini‑game collection that randomly switches between dodge, collect, memory, and platformer modes, each with its own state and mechanics. Tracks score, timers, and per‑mode input handling.
frontend/src/pages/games/PacMan.tsx: Grid‑based Pac‑Man clone with movable ghosts, pellets, walls, and keyboard‑controlled movement. Manages maze generation, collision rules, scoring, lives, and animation timing.
frontend/src/pages/games/PauseMechanic.t: Top‑down collect‑and‑avoid game with a pause feature that triggers random effects like spawning, rewinding, or teleporting. Tracks movement, hazards, coins, history, and pause state.
frontend/src/pages/games/PoliceBuddyChas: Lane‑based chasing game where the player switches lanes to catch criminals while avoiding escapes. Handles spawning, movement, scoring, difficulty scaling, and game over logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/PumpkinSmash.ts: Canvas game where bouncing pumpkin emojis move and the player clicks them to score before a timer ends, with continuous spawning and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/ReverseProgress: Platformer where abilities are removed each level, using keyboard controls, physics, enemies, platforms, and a goal to progress.
frontend/src/pages/games/ScreenIsEnemy.t: Top‑down coin‑collecting game where random screen effects harm the player as they move and gather coins for points.
frontend/src/pages/games/ShapeShiftingWo: Player swaps between forms to bypass obstacles and collect items across levels, with simple movement and collision checks.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlimeEvolutionA: Arena survival game where the slime evolves temporarily while dodging and interacting with various enemy types to gain score.
frontend/src/pages/games/SoundBasedWorld: Canvas-based movement game using sound-wave effects, obstacles, and goal detection with simple physics and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceInvaders.t: Browser Space Invaders clone with waves of enemies, bullets, player movement, scoring, and game loop timing.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceStationLif: Resource‑management game where roles, random events, and day cycles affect resources, score, and survival.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpeedIsHealth.t: Canvas action game where player speed affects health, with obstacles, coins, and momentum-based movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpiderWebPuzzle: Puzzle game generating connected web nodes that players disconnect to clear levels and win.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperpowerTrain: Side‑scrolling obstacle game where the player moves, unlocks powers, and interacts with obstacles based on active abilities.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperSpeedyRace: Endless runner racing game where the player switches lanes to avoid obstacles, with increasing speed and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/Tetris.tsx: Implementation of Tetris with falling pieces, line clearing, scoring, and full board/rotation logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/ThemeParkBuilde: Theme park management game where players place rides, manage cash, happiness, and generate income over time.
frontend/src/pages/games/TicTacToe.tsx: Tic‑tac‑toe game supporting PvP and AI modes with win checking, draw detection, and simple AI logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeControlAdve: A complex time‑manipulation survival game with spawning enemies, projectiles, coins, and cooldown‑based time powers. Manages a continuous animation loop, player state, difficulty scaling, and various spawn timers.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeLoopPizzaDe: A canvas-based delivery game with time loops, obstacles, and pizzas to deliver before the timer resets. Tracks player movement, obstacle removal, and repeated loop progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/TinyHeroGiantWo: A side‑scrolling platformer where a tiny player navigates oversized world objects, collects coins, and reaches a distant goal. Includes physics, collisions, camera tracking, and large static environment objects.
frontend/src/pages/games/TutorialIsVilla: A joke tutorial game where the tutorial character sabotages the player with traps, fake coins, and misleading instructions. Handles timed messages, trap spawning, player movement, and health interactions.
frontend/src/pages/games/WordWizard.tsx: A timed word‑scramble puzzle game where players form correct words from shuffled letters. Manages rounds, scoring, timers, and tracking discovered words.
frontend/src/pages/games/YoureLateAlways: React canvas-based mini-game managing player movement, projectiles, explosions, fires, and level-based chaos. Handles input, game loop updates, collisions, and restart logic.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHub.tsx: Shows a catalog of games with icons, categories, and difficulty options, enabling navigation to individual game modules.
frontend/src/pages/GamesModule.tsx: Displays a tabbed game library with filtering by type and renders game cards with progress and difficulty. Manages selection state and UI layout for browsing games.
frontend/src/pages/GreenScreenFunPage.ts: Lets users upload or capture a photo and place it into preset cartoon scenes. Handles camera usage, image compositing on canvas, and downloading the final image.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveShortsPage: Implements interactive branching stories where users choose scenes and navigate through story paths. Supports story selection, scene rendering, and restart navigation.
frontend/src/pages/JokesGenerator.tsx: Provides a local joke generator with categories, random selection, favorites, sharing, and audio playback actions. Manages joke state, searching, and simple interactions.
frontend/src/pages/JokesPage.tsx: Renders a joke hub using backend queries for listing, submitting, rating, and favoriting jokes. Supports category filtering, random selection, and CRUD-like interactions.
frontend/src/pages/KaraokeModePage.tsx: Implements a karaoke page with selectable songs, timed lyric progression, and playback controls.
frontend/src/pages/LearnHubPage.tsx: Defines the learning hub with categorized lessons, progress tracking, and interactive activity components.
frontend/src/pages/MusicRemixPage.tsx: Provides a music remix tool enabling loop selection, mixing, playback, visualization, and remix submission.
frontend/src/pages/ParentalControl.tsx: Renders parental control settings including screen time, content filters, and admin user approvals.
Allows users to edit profile info, avatars, and themes, loading and saving profile data via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsAchievements.t: Static achievements, badges, and challenges displayed with progress and themed cards.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Fetches user rewards and badge proofs to display dynamic scores, badges, and celebratory interactions.
frontend/src/pages/ScaryHub.tsx: Shows a themed hub of spooky mini‑games with sound toggles and surprise animations.
frontend/src/pages/SeasonalEventsPage.ts: Displays seasonal themed activities, decorations, and stories with completion tracking and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/SmartHubPage.tsx: Aggregates many activity types, showing personalized recommendations using user game state and rewards.
frontend/src/pages/SpinWheelPage.tsx: Implements a prize wheel with cooldowns, animations, and server‑driven rewards including points, badges, and extra spins.
frontend/src/pages/StickerCreatorPage.ts: Provides a canvas-based drawing tool to create custom stickers, supporting touch/mouse drawing, color/brush controls, and saving uploads.
frontend/src/pages/StoryBuilderPage.tsx: A story creation UI that builds scenes with characters, props, and text, converting them to backend story formats and saving via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: UI for assembling simple themed videos with templates, characters, and stickers, allowing preview and export actions.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGeneratorPage.ts: Generates animated video frames from a story input and selected character/background, rendering them on a canvas with play controls.
frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx: Renders categorized kid-friendly YouTube channels with age groups, modal previews, and navigation. Manages selected channel/category state and handles blocked embeds.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualPetHubPage.tsx: Displays and customizes a virtual pet using saved backend data, including accessories, decorations, home styles, mood, and rewards. Syncs user progress and triggers feedback effects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL. Supports both querystring and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining content paths, theming, extended colors, fonts, container settings, and custom neon shadows. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Art Gallery app, tracking versions, known upload issues, and existing feature requirements to improve error handling and authentication flows.
